title: Snows of Aorangi
brief_description: Shows champions Hans Bohny, Harvey Clifford, and Peter Lawlor on a ski run on the slopes of New Zealand’s highest mountain, Mt Cook or Aorangi - “the cloud piercer” as it is known by the Maoris. Includes spectacular scenes of a snow-storm, an avalanche, and strange ice formations.
